sentences.en: a bloated body floating in the canal
sentences.cn: 沟渠里一具发胀的浮尸

sentences.en: Egypt has lost out on revenues from the Suez Canal.
sentences.cn: 埃及在苏伊士运河上的收益上受了损。

sentences.en: Hearing can be affected by ear wax blocking the ear canal.
sentences.cn: 耳垢堵塞耳道可能会影响听力。

sentences.en: His decapitated body was found floating in a canal.
sentences.cn: 人们发现他被斩首的尸体漂浮在一条水渠里。

sentences.en: South America is joined to North America by a canal.
sentences.cn: 南美洲和北美洲由一条运河连在一起.

sentences.en: The canal is open to shipping.
The canal was built between 1793 and 1797.
The Grand Canal joins the Hai River at Tianjin.
sentences.cn: 大运河在天津和海河汇合.

sentences.en: The lake communicates with the sea by means of a canal.
sentences.cn: 这个湖通过运河和大海相连.

sentences.en: The road and the canal are parallel to each other.
The rough rock walls were like the sides of a deep canal.
sentences.cn: 凸凹不平的石墙就像一条很深的运河的河岸。

sentences.en: the sluggish black waters of the canal
sentences.cn: 运河里缓慢流动的黑乎乎的河水

sentences.en: There the irrigation canal links up with the reservoir.
sentences.cn: 这条灌溉渠在那里与水库连接起来.

sentences.en: They blockaded the Suez Canal in violation of international agreement.
sentences.cn: 他们违反国际公约封锁了苏伊士运河.

sentences.en: We took a promenade along the canal after Sunday dinner.
sentences.cn: 星期天晚饭后我们沿着运河散步.

sentences.en: We walked along by the side of the canal.
sentences.cn: 我们沿着运河边往前走。

words.tran_cn: 管道形成；开凿运河；运河网
运河网；开运河；[外科] 造管术
在…开运河；将…导入水道；修改成运河
[水运]运河；[地理]水道；[建]管道；灌溉水渠

phrases.tran_cn: 听管；听道；耳道（等于auditory meatus）
巴拿马运河（穿过巴拿马地峡，接通太平洋和大西洋）
苏伊士运河（位于埃及东北部）

trans.tran_cn: 运河，灌溉渠，食道，气管，导管，管道
trans.tran_en: a long passage dug into the ground and filled with water, either for boats to travel along, or to take water to a place
